newsitem.title: UK: Goldman sachs sets warrants on three German stocks.
newsitem.headline: Goldman sachs sets warrants on three German stocks.

text.p: Goldman Sachs and Co Wertpapier GmbH has issued five million American-style call warrants each on shares of Schering AG, BASF AG and Daimler-Benz AG, lead manager Goldman Sachs and Co said.
WARRANTS STRIKE SPOT REF ISSUE PREMIUM GEARING
SCHERING 170 DEM 154 DEM 2.11 DEM 24.09 PCT 7.30 TIMES
DAIMLER 140 DEM 122 DEM 1.48 DEM 26.88 PCT 8.24 TIMES
